title: Robust Coin Flipping.
abstract: Alice seeks an information-theoretically secure source of pri- vate random data. Unfortunately, she lacks a personal source and must use remote sources controlled by other parties. Alice wants to simulate a coin flip of specified bias α, as a function of data she receives from p sources; she seeks privacy from any coalition of r of them.
